verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
We are gathered for Thy blessing,
We will wait upon our God:
We will trust in Him who loved us,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And who bought us
with His blood.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
as Thou hast promised,
Come, O come,
and take Thy place.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Bring us low in prayer before Thee,
And with faith our souls inspire,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Till we claim, by faith,
the promise
Of the Holy Ghost and fire.
